description: I introduced Docker and Docker Compose to streamline deployment processes and improved backend performance using Go—resulting in a RAM usage reduction of over 50%—while creating API connections for messaging, payment, and billing vendors. Additionally, I developed web applications for both client and admin usage and assisted in building an e-commerce dashboard using Laravel.

Developed a Laravel-based POS system for cashier dashboards and client orders, integrating Go and gRPC to ensure secure data transmission and improved transaction efficiency. Maintained server reliability and designed transmitters to streamline vendor-client connectivity, ensuring consistent application uptime.
Supported troubleshooting and optimization of internal backend code.
